name: FluffyBird [SWEET EDITION]
description: The Fluffy Bird Sweet Edition is nothing more than modified version of Flappy Bird. If you eat unhealthy food you will get fat but If you eat healthy food you will get smaller! It's our first project for game making classes. The game is created by two people (Reumatyzm - Code, Implementation, Miqnia - Graphic, Sound, Music). Currently we are not planning to add anything to the game, so please enjoy the Fluffy Bird (Sweet Edition)!
